short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Produce random numbers for different kinds of dice commonly used in gaming.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random numbers for various gaming dice: one-hundred-sided (2d10), twenty-sided, twelve-sided, ten-sided, eight-sided, six-sided, four-sided, and two-sided. It works in offline mode, too.
